text:
Good morning everyone, quick question - I have blog posts in two language variations, English and Danish.  To render them in the template file, I use this

*{% related_blog_posts* 
    *limit=100,* 
    *callback="blog_post_formatter"*
*%}*

It works great, but the language of the current page gets ignores and it always pulls English variations of the blogposts, even on the Danish blog page. Is there some parameter I have to add, maybe? I can't see anything in the documentaiton.
